tool_description: An API showing all the laterst Climate Change News around the world
name: Climate Change Live API
title: Climate Change Live API

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Climate change news all around the world

api_list.name: GET ALL Climate change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-api7.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-api7.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
